it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message

Class CoapMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message.CoapMessageFactory

  • public class CoapMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Collects some static methods for simplifying the creation of CoAP messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoapMessageFactory()

      Creates a new CoAP NON-confirmable request.
      static CoapResponse createPiggyBackedResponse(CoapRequest req, CoapResponseCode response_code)

    • Method Detail

      • createRequest

        public static CoapRequest createRequest(boolean confirmable,
                                        CoapRequestMethod method,
                                        CoapURI request_uri)
        Creates a new request.
        Parameters:
        confirmable - whether the request should be CON (true) or NON (false)
        method - the request method (GET, POST, PUT, or DELETE)
        request_uri - the resource URI
        Returns:
        the (CON or NON) request

      • createCONRequest

        public static CoapRequest createCONRequest(CoapRequestMethod method,
                                           CoapURI request_uri)
        Creates a new CoAP CONfirmable request.
        Parameters:
        method - the request method (GET, POST, PUT, or DELETE)
        request_uri - the resource URI
        Returns:
        the new request message

      • createNONRequest

        public static CoapRequest createNONRequest(CoapRequestMethod method,
                                           CoapURI request_uri)
        Creates a new CoAP NON-confirmable request.
        Parameters:
        method - the request method (GET, POST, PUT, or DELETE)
        request_uri - the resource URI
        Returns:
        the new request message

      • createResponse

        public static CoapResponse createResponse(CoapRequest req,
                                          CoapResponseCode response_code)
        Creates a new response based on a request.
        Parameters:
        req - the originated request
        response_code - the response code
        Returns:
        CON response for CON request or NON response for NON request

      • createPiggyBackedResponse

        public static CoapResponse createPiggyBackedResponse(CoapRequest req,
                                                     CoapResponseCode response_code)
        Creates a new piggybacked response based on a request.
        Parameters:
        req - the originated request
        response_code - the response code
        Returns:
        piggy-backed ACK response for CON request or NON response for NON request
